Description: Live in the vibrant Back Bay neighborhood. This studio offers a warm, inviting space you will love. Great access from local shops, restaurants, schools, and parks. One will enjoy this charming well-designed room with hardwood flooring, freshly painted walls, tons of lighting, private entrance, in-unit laundry, renovated bath and kitchen. Rent includes heat, water, hot water, electricity, and internet. Please no pets. Available 9/1
